title: Does anyone use the spectate high elo games?
body: I don't know anyone who uses it

replies.body: I have a look every now and then.
What, can you choose to spec high elo? Haven't seen a function for that, only just normal spectate which is basically all elos.

I do improves my gameplay with certain champions I haven't played yet, gives me ideas and knowledge.
Also I look at certain matchups I might be interested in if I get wrecked by them.
But hey I'm level 20 gg.
Nah, only streamers. BUT you can learn abit from spectate too, you can watch movements better
